definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Fireworks welcomed the new year in moscow's red square.
sentences.chinese: 人们在莫斯科红场燃放烟花庆祝新年。

sentences.english: I checked into the National Hotel, just off Red Square.
sentences.chinese: 我住进了“红场”边上的民族饭店。

sentences.english: Red Square has always been a central gathering place, even in the days of the Czars.
sentences.chinese: 即使是在沙皇政权时期，红场也向来都是中心聚集地。

sentences.english: Smoke from wildfires in Red Square last week (Image: Natalia Kolesnikova/AFP/Getty)
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，野火散发出的烟雾弥漫红场。

sentences.english: Once again military parades are being held in Red Square.
sentences.chinese: 红场再次举行阅兵仪式。

sentences.english: In the red mausoleum, Lenin people visit every day the dead looks.
sentences.chinese: 在红场里的列宁陵墓，每天都有民众瞻仰其遗容。

definition: Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)

pinyin: Sai1 wa3 si1 tuo1 bo1 er3

definition: Volgograd, Russian city on the Volga River 伏爾加河|伏尔加河[Fu2 er3 jia1 He2]
